hotels.name: Parc 55 San Francisco - A Hilton Hotel
hotels.des: Unfortunately we didn’t how or weren’t of the face that we were so close to the airport, very close 10 min away. With Uber we‘ve paid 2€ , but on our arrival day the hotel arranged a taxi for us and charged 20€ for it, which is way too much for not even 10 min drive - more expensive than in Europe. And the patrol in Egypt is very cheap. We were a little disappointed about that fact. And the guy who is in charge for the taxi who is sitting next to the entrance was not very polite either.

There is also a conditioner and a fridge. Big window with a big balcony. The staff was very very helpful and approachable. They were ready to solve our problems and this was great! We loved the food here as everything was well washed before cooking and served well cooked which is not always a case in this country. The variety of dishes served was better than in other hotels.
hotels.name: Intercontinental San Francisco

hotels.des: Fantastic hotel, beautiful rooms and overall just an exceptional service. The roof top pool is just a wonderful place to relax in. The rooms themselves have an incredible bathroom and views over the Nile! Service is great. Downstairs bar is also a good spot for some evening drinks. Really enjoyed the stay here and would stay again!
hotels.name: InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco
